avsnitt.b: If you have a child through a surrogate

innhold.avsnitt: As the biological father of the child you will normally be entitled to the entire parental benefit period as father 1. The other father may be entitled to the parental benefit if he adopts his step child and there are still days remaining in the parental benefit period.
Your paternity as the biological father must be approved in Norway in order for you to be entitled to the parental benefit.
If you are both adoptive parents
You can choose which of you shall start the parental benefit period as father 1. 15 weeks are allocated to the person who is starting. Your period commences when care of the child is assumed.
If you adopt from abroad, you can choose if you would like to start receiving the parental benefit when you assume care of the child while abroad, or the day you arrive in Norway with the child.
